sentences.en: At the end of the film, the man becomes a thief out of sheer desperation.
sentences.cn: 在电影的结尾, 这个人由于彻底绝望而成了小偷.

sentences.en: Even Mr. Clare began to feel tragical at the dairyman's desperation.
sentences.cn: 连克莱先生看到牛奶商这样无计奈何的样子,都觉得凄惨起来.

sentences.en: He flung out of the room white with anger and desperation.
sentences.cn: 他拂袖而去,由于愤怒和绝望而面无人色.

sentences.en: I would inspire you with repentance and not drive you to desperation.
sentences.cn: 我是想叫你听了翻然悔改,而不是要把你赶到绝路上去.

sentences.en: In desperation , she called Louise and asked for her help.
sentences.cn: 在走投无路的情况下，她给路易丝打了个电话请她帮忙。
我走投无路，于是改变了策略。

sentences.en: In desperation they resorted to violence.
sentences.cn: 走投无路中,他们采取了暴力.

sentences.en: In desperation, he finally broke down the door.
sentences.cn: 最后,他横了心把门砸开.

sentences.en: In general, desperation guided treatment of the deranged.
sentences.cn: 总之, 绝望指导着精神错乱病人的治疗方案.

sentences.en: In his desperation to escape, Tom had slipped and broken a leg.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在拼命逃跑时滑倒摔断了一条腿.

sentences.en: The Deputy's discreet answers were at last driving him to desperation.
sentences.cn: 国会议员那种谨慎的答话,终于使得他大失所望.

sentences.en: The prisoner clawed at the cell door in desperation.
sentences.cn: 囚犯绝望地乱抓牢房的门.

sentences.en: The ruffian laid about in desperation.
sentences.cn: 歹徒在绝望中向四周乱打一气.
这些举措带有绝望的色彩.

sentences.en: This feeling of desperation and helplessness was common to most of the refugees.
sentences.cn: 大多数难民都有这种绝望和无助的感觉。

words.tran_cn: 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的

trans.tran_cn: 绝望，孤注一掷，铤而走险，拼命
